title: Heart-stopping moment young girl clings to the bonnet of an SUV as it speeds down a road
text:
This is the heart-stopping moment a young girl clings to the bonnet of a car as it speeds down a rural road.

The footage was captured on dashcam at 6pm on Saturday at the Yan Yean Reservoir Park, in Melbourne, according to Nine News.

A girl can be seen hugging the silver SUV's front as it races past the camera while the car's occupants squeal with laughter and excitement.

The witness, who wished to remain anonymous, said he believed the girl on the bonnet was between 10 and 13 years old.

He said about eight other children were packed in the vehicle, as the female driver drove them to the toilet on the other end of the park.

It's unknown whether the child on the bonnet was injured.

A Victoria Police spokesman said no formal reports had been made about the incident.
description: This is the heart-stopping moment  (pictured) a child clung to the bonnet of a car as it sped down a road.
authors: Tita Smith For Daily Mail Australia
